name: Peter Twal
bio: Peter Twal is a Jordanian-American, an electrical engineer, and the author of Our Earliest Tattoos which won the 2018 Etel Adnan Poetry Prize (University of Arkansas Press, 2018). His poetry has appeared in Best New Poets, Kenyon Review Online, West Branch Wired, and elsewhere. Peter Twal earned his MFA from the University of Notre Dame.
